data.text: Recommend a Three-Season Sleeping Bag / Quilt suitable for UK Weather

Any recommendations for sleeping bag / quilt. Looking for something which packs down small and suitable for UK - three seasons. Big Agnes pluton Ul 40 looks good but quite pricey at Â£250 / $330 / â‚¬300.

All down sleeping bags and quilts that pack down are going to be well into that price range if not above. I use a Sea to Summit Spark SPI 40 for that temperature range and it was $330 but it packs down smaller than a 1L Nalgene.
data.author: Dustin Schulten
